arm_group.description:
Experimental: Physiogel treated & Non-treated
1 Palmitoylethanolamide, Physiogel 3 times a day for 2 weeks

brief_summary.textblock: Assessment of needs of moisturizers after various laser treatments

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Needs of Moisturizers After Various Laser Treatments

detailed_description.textblock:
The investigators would like to assess of needs of moisturizers after various laser
      treatment

      : by investigating the changes in the skin barrier function after  fractional carbon dioxide
      laser and fractional Er:Glass laser in mice and human skin

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  at least 18 years of age without any dermatologic diseases

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Taking other known dermatologic disease

          -  Others who are shown pigmented lesion on treated-area

          -  Who have allergy or history of hypersensitivity reaction to moisturizers

          -  Who have other definitive cutaneous findings

intervention.description: Application of moisturizer on laser-treated area
Application of moisturizer on laser-treated area

facility.name: Department of dermatology, Pusan National University Hospital

clinical_study.official_title: Phase 4 Study of Assessment of Needs of Moisturizers After Various Laser Treatment

primary_outcome.description: The clinical assessment of erythema, pigmentation, transepidermal water loss will be evaluated by using apparatus.
primary_outcome.measure: Clinical assessment of erythema, transepidermal water loss

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
